EmailTemplate.name: Renewal reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Renewal of financial planning services
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear "{!Account.Name}"
It has been such a pleasure being your partner in your journey towards financial freedom.
We have in the last year done the following: <<Drop down to choose>> - Identified the different goals you want to achieve in your life - Drawn up a workable financial plan that will help you achieve these goals - Protected your family against the various risks that you face - Begun an investment plan to achieve your goals <<Elaborate which goals>> - Better planned your taxes - Put together a proper Succession Plan
We have come some distance, but we have a long way to go. We trust you found value and will consider it worthwhile to renew your relationship with us which is due on {!Renewal__c.Renewal_Date__c}. Look forward to a long term rewarding association with you.
Thanks and regards {!Account.OwnerFullName}
